How many total bookings were made, and how many were successful vs cancelled vs incomplete?

What is the percentage distribution of booking status (Success, Cancelled by Customer, Cancelled by Driver, Incomplete)?

How does booking volume vary across different days of the month?

What is the trend of successful bookings over time?

ðŸ”¹ Revenue & Value Analysis

What is the total revenue generated from successful rides?

How does total revenue compare between weekdays and weekends?

Which payment method contributes the highest total revenue?

What is the average booking value by vehicle type?

What proportion of bookings fall under:

ðŸ”¹ Vehicle & Ride Analysis

What is the average ride distance for each vehicle type?

Which vehicle type has the highest average ride distance?

How does ride distance distribution vary across vehicle types?

What is the relationship between ride distance and booking value?

ðŸ”¹ Customer Behavior Analysis

Who are the top 5 customers by number of rides booked?

How many customers have repeated cancellations?

What percentage of customers cancel more than once?

What is the distribution of customer ratings across vehicle types?

ðŸ”¹ Cancellation Analysis

What are the most common reasons for customer cancellations?

What are the most common reasons for driver cancellations?

How do customer cancellations compare to driver cancellations?

Which vehicle types face the highest cancellation rates?

ðŸ”¹ Driver Performance Analysis

What is the average driver rating by vehicle type?

What are the minimum and maximum driver ratings for Prime Sedan?

How does driver rating distribution differ across vehicle types?

Is there a relationship between driver ratings and ride distance?

ðŸ”¹ Payment Behavior

What percentage of rides were paid using each payment method?

How does payment method usage differ across vehicle types?

Is there any difference in average booking value by payment method?

ðŸ”¹ Incomplete Ride Analysis

What percentage of rides were incomplete?

What are the most common reasons for incomplete rides?

How do incomplete rides vary across vehicle types?

ðŸ”¹ Advanced / Dashboard-Level Questions

What are the key KPIs for overall ride performance (Bookings, Revenue, Avg Rating, Avg Distance)?

Which factors most strongly impact successful ride completion?

How does customer satisfaction vary with vehicle type and payment method?

What operational risks can be identified from cancellation and incomplete ride patterns?
